summary: Damon Thornblood is a retired Dremora hunter who has been chosen to be your new Housecarl.
descriptionHtml: Damon Thornblood is a retired nord Dremora hunter who has been chosen to be your new Housecarl and is waiting for you at Four Shields Tavern at Dragon Brigde "Just use your imagination on who or how you got him as a housecarl,I think it's better that way"...He's a very skilled two handed warrior that will level by your side and can even marry him if you so wish..He's very power so using him on a new game would be kinda a cheat..You've been warned you little cheaters you :) For him to look like he does from the pics you'll need Apachii Sky Hair or I'll most likely be bold http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/? Better males http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/? High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/? Hope you enjoy!!!
author: joshx336
